column1: Yes to an extent, but in nature it's not dominance vis a vis the person you are having sex with.
Dominance in human rape is the breaching of consent. So you are asserting dominance over the person you rape. It's not about the sex.
Dominance in the animal kingdom is more of a mano a mano affair. Rape is done by animals that arent dominant and hence have no access
quite diverging motivations though. access to mates vs assertng of dominance.
